attributes.action: Prosecute people who train their dogs to fight and be aggressive.  No exceptions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last night my nan's dog (Shitzu) was attacked and nearly killed by a staff / pitbull type dog.  The dog had no collar or lead on and charged at us, leaving no doubt in our minds of it's intentions.  The owners have been seen on a regular basis training the dog to aggressively jump and attack a rope hanging from a tree in their garden.  This is the second time she has been attacked by the same dog.  After veterinary treatment this morning, she has been treated for puncture wounds to her chest, lacerations to her back leg, and severe bruising.  

People who think that encouraging a dog to be aggressive need to be arrested and charged with cruelty not just to the dog itself but also to any animal that is unlucky enough to come into contact with.  

This is a all too often occurrence in this country, especially in the inner cities.

It needs to be STOPPED!
